url.description: The URL of the resource for which to fetch oEmbed data.
The URL of the resource for which to fetch oEmbed data.

maxwidth.description: The maximum width of the embed frame in pixels.

maxheight.description: The maximum height of the embed frame in pixels.

discover.description: Whether to perform an oEmbed discovery request for unsanctioned providers.

key.description: A 12-character Akismet API key. Available at akismet.com/get/

akismet_strictness.description: If true, Akismet will automatically discard the worst spam automatically rather than putting it in the spam folder.

akismet_show_user_comments_approved.description: If true, show the number of approved comments beside each comment author in the comments list page.

interval.description: The time period for which to retrieve stats. Options: 60-days, 6-months, all
The time period for which to retrieve stats. Options: 60-days, 6-months, all

context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

after.description: Limit response to posts published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

modified_after.description: Limit response to posts modified after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

author.description: Limit result set to posts assigned to specific authors.

author_exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes posts assigned to specific authors.

before.description: Limit response to posts published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

modified_before.description: Limit response to posts modified before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

slug.description: Limit result set to posts with one or more specific slugs.

status.description: Limit result set to posts assigned one or more statuses.

tax_relation.description: Limit result set based on relationship between multiple taxonomies.

categories.description: Limit result set to items with specific terms assigned in the categories taxonomy.

oneOf.title: Term ID List
oneOf.description: Match terms with the listed IDs.

include_children.description: Whether to include child terms in the terms limiting the result set.

categories_exclude.description: Limit result set to items except those with specific terms assigned in the categories taxonomy.

oneOf.title: Term ID List
oneOf.description: Match terms with the listed IDs.

tags.description: Limit result set to items with specific terms assigned in the tags taxonomy.

oneOf.title: Term ID List
oneOf.description: Match terms with the listed IDs.

tags_exclude.description: Limit result set to items except those with specific terms assigned in the tags taxonomy.

oneOf.description: Match terms with the listed IDs.

sticky.description: Limit result set to items that are sticky.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

src.description: URL to the edited image file.

angle.description: Angle to rotate clockwise in degrees.

left.description: Horizontal position from the left to begin the crop as a percentage of the image width.

top.description: Vertical position from the top to begin the crop as a percentage of the image height.

width.description: Width of the crop as a percentage of the image width.

height.description: Height of the crop as a percentage of the image height.

rotation.description: The amount to rotate the image clockwise in degrees. DEPRECATED: Use `modifiers` instead.

x.description: As a percentage of the image, the x position to start the crop from. DEPRECATED: Use `modifiers` instead.

y.description: As a percentage of the image, the y position to start the crop from. DEPRECATED: Use `modifiers` instead.

width.description: As a percentage of the image, the width to crop the image to. DEPRECATED: Use `modifiers` instead.

height.description: As a percentage of the image, the height to crop the image to. DEPRECATED: Use `modifiers` instead.
